wikipedia_page.main: Henry Edward Denison Hammond (26 November 1866 – 16 June 1910) was an English footballer who played as a Right back. Hammond played club football for Oxford University and earned one cap for the national team in 1889. After his football career ended, Hammond became a folk music historian.

response: Henry Hammond (1605–1660) was an English churchman.
Henry Hammond may also refer to:
*Henry Hammond (American football) (1913–2004), football player for the Chicago Bears
